p: Carnosol showed strong inhibitory effect on the EBV-EA induction and exhibited a remarkable effect on mouse skin tumor promotion in an in vivo two-stage carcinogenesis model. Carnosol has also been shown to be partly responsible for the antioxidant and anti-tumorogenesis properties of rosemary ( Rosmarinus officinalis L.). Recently, carnosol has been proved to be efficacious in the chemoprevention and/or chemotherapy of hormone-responsive cancers [ 45, 46, 47].
